message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 60 and you can take 40.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair. Let's see if we can agree on this.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share this time. Let's try 65/35. It's still a decent split, and we can wrap this up soon.
Let's go back to the original split. I'm willing to accept a 40/60 division to avoid further rounds and risk of losing more value.
